entry.title: Bandit OverTheWire Writeup, Bandit11 & Bandit12
entry.summary:
Level 13 → Level 14
Another challenge for today, so let’s try solving it, here’s the challenge.
Level 13 Task
Now, we being tasked to use SSH key instead of the usual password that we have been using so far. Interesting, let’s read what is the reference being cited in the task about. I also curious what is the deal with this whole “key” thingies.
Now I see why it’s more secure using the ...

entry.title: Bandit OverTheWire Writeup, Bandit11 & Bandit12
entry.summary:
Level 11 → Level 12
Let’s get into the point straight, today we have challenge 11 and 12, here we go.
Level 11 Task
So we begin as usual by reading what the external reading has to offered. In this case, OverTheWire guide us to read about ROT13 in wikipedia in order to solve this level, well let’s see then what is this ROT 13 about.
Oh, so it’s basically switching position of alphabetica...

entry.title: Bandit OverTheWire Writeup, Bandit6 & Bandit7

New Series This is a new series where I go over how I learn linux by completing each level of challenge on OverTheWire, this being done by me because I still feels my Linux skill still shallow and needed improvement and enter Bandit OverTheWire. Shoutout to the OverTheWire team once again for this useful learning. Let’s get straight in to the writeup.
